precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying options like 'My Documents', 'My Computer', 'Control Panel', and 'All Programs'.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The 'Start' menu will open, displaying options such as 'My Computer,' 'Control Panel,' and 'Printers and Faxes.'

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The Windows XP Control Panel window will open, covering the Start Menu.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open and displaying the 'Pick a category' view.
action: Click the 'Switch to Classic View' link located in the navigation pane on the left side of the window.
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to the Classic View, displaying all available control panel icons.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open in Classic View.
The Windows XP Control Panel window is open in Classic View.
expected_results: The active selection of icons in the Control Panel will shift one position to the right.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel window is open.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will move to hover over the "Taskbar and Start Menu" icon.

precondition: The "Power Options" icon is highlighted in the Windows XP Control Panel.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled "Never" next to the "Turn off hard disks" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time interval options for turning off the hard disks will appear.

precondition: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel window is open.
action: Double Left Click on the icon labeled "Display".

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" tab is visible.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab is active. A preview window displaying a black screen with the Windows XP logo, indicating no active screensaver, will appear.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow on the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is open, displaying a list of available screensavers.
action: Click the "[None]" option within the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will show "[None]" as the selected screensaver. The "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will remain inactive.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open.
action: Click the 'X' button in the top right corner of the Control Panel window.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will close.
